song.title: Nos Petites Femmes
song.info:
Our seventh submission for WeeklyBeats, and still going strong. We decided to do an all out chiptune track again this week. Screaming melodies, fuck yeah!
Finished on Valentine's day so dedicated to our lovely girlfriends (Marieke and Anouk), hence the title (our little ladies)!
16 channel, 86 kb, extended module (.xm). Samples by the almighty malmen and ourselves.
